programme.title: Sunny Side Up

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: The Winx and Twinkly follow Orion on Iridia. They find out the core of the star has been destroyed, and with their Cosmix powers they can't repair it. Twinkly catches up with her friend Lumilla while Orion, disappointed by the failure of the Winx, is contacted by Valtor, who offers him a deal: if he helps him beat the Winx, he will save Prometia, Orion's home planet, in return...

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The Triangle Man is in such a rush that he can't take the time to fix things along the way. What happens when the imp steals masterpiece from the museum? Will Ollie and the gang be able to stop him? Will The Triangle Man learn to stop hurrying and do what it needs to be done? The squares can't keep their hands to themselves. They keep going to places they shouldn't and touching other people's things without asking their permission. Things go wrong when they decide to take the aliens' spaceship.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!
